alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 2:19AM MDT until April 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Brookings. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.3 feet, 473rd Avenue north of the gauge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 AM CDT Wednesday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to around 10.6 feet this morning before falling below flood stage Saturday. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Sioux River Brookings 9.0 10.5 Wed 2 am 10.2 9.7 9.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
